string.text: I feel bad, can't you see? I need a first aid kit, or at least a bandage.
Thanks, bro, I won't forget this.
How do you walk in the Zone? Some disease gets you and you can't even heal yourself.
Heh, why are you like this? Sorry, I won't give you mine, or I'll be left with nothing.
It's up to you, but don't think it does you any honor.
Hey, bro, give me a hand! First aid kit! I'm bleeding!
